author: mturk
msg: Do not allocate envvar maps on create. They are allocated on first use

author: cziegeler
msg: Remove a timed event if it is based on a date after it has been fired from the repository.

author: tellison
msg: Add ASF sponsorship and thanks page links.

author: slaws
msg: Fix up the conversation-ws itest and add it into the itest pom.xml
This includes making all the sub tests run against the same set of clients/servers rather than creating afresh for each test.
Required several changes to the conversation processing along the way to ensure that it works in both local and remote scenarios.
